entries.summary: Literature review: CYNIC kernel architecture, phi-derived hyperparameters, EWC, amplification hypothesis established
Hypothesis formulated: phi (alpha=0.038, EWC=True) amplifies performance via memory + forgetting protection
Design: 3 experiments, sigma_real=2.19 measured, probe P2 bug fixed, TD0Learner + QEntry + grid framework built
Experimentation: Exp#0 (synthetic, 13 pairs), Exp#1 (real, 5 probes), Exp#2 (amplification warm/cold). All 3 confirm phi hypothesis. 116 tests.
Synthesis complete: SYNTHESIS.md â€” 5 findings, hypothesis VALIDATED, 116 tests, 3 experiments
